name: Veridis Quo
description:
This game was made in Unity over a time period of approximately 8 weeks with a team of 8 people. I was the main programmer on the team. The intention was to make a spooky adventure game with minimal shooting elements. From this project I learned the importance of keeping a schedule for your team as well as the importance of communication among your team.

Veridis Quo is an Adventure game where you play as a scientist whose ship is infected by spores. He takes and escape pod and crash lands onto an unknown planet. Can he find the source of the spores and save the day?

How to Play:

Use WASD to move the player, space to jump, and left mouse button to fire. Use Right click to toggle your trail ability and Q to toggle your mushroom vision.
